projects.title: ChatRigel - AI Chatbot
projects.bodyText:
- Custom AI Chatbot Application.
 - Frontend built with **Nuxt**.
 - Backend API powered by **Laravel**.

projects.title: Desa Ganten - Village Portal
projects.bodyText:
- Official village website providing information system about Desa Ganten
 - Developed using PHP and Laravel Framework for reliable performance.
 - Features tourism information, local news, and community services.
 - Fully responsive design optimized for mobile and desktop devices.
 - Report creation services for specific purposes such as domicile certificates, marriage certificates, etc.
 - PDF generate for report.

projects.title: Templatenesia - Digital Product Marketplace
projects.bodyText:
- Online marketplace for digital products such as website templates and themes.
 - Developed using **PHP** and **Laravel Framework** for a scalable backend.
 - Frontend designed with **Alpine.js** and **Tailwind CSS** for a modern look and feel.
 - Admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and users using **Filament Admin Panel**.

projects.title: SD IT Semesta Cendekia School Portal
projects.bodyText:
- School portal based on Website for SD IT Semesta Cendekia..
 - Built with **PHP** and **Laravel Framework** for robust backend.
 - Interactive frontend using **Alpine.js** and styled with **Tailwind CSS**.
 - Features include student management, announcements, and administrative tools.
 - PDF Report generate feature

projects.title: Diabetes Disease Prediction - Machine Learning
projects.bodyText:
- Predictive analytics application for diabetes disease based on patient medical history.
 - Implemented using Decision Tree algorithm with **Python** and **Streamlit**.
 - Data processing with **Pandas** and **Numpy** libraries.
 - Professional visualizations using **Matplotlib** and **Seaborn**.

projects.title: Oje ATV - Offroad Adventure Rental
projects.bodyText:
- Business website for ATV rental services specializing in offroad adventures.
 - Built with **WordPress** for easy content management.
 - Responsive design created with **Elementor** page builder.

projects.title: Employee Attendance System
projects.bodyText:
- Web-based Employee Attendance Management System for internship programs.
 - Built with PHP, CSS, JavaScript using Laravel Framework with Livewire, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.
 - Advanced GPS-based location detection feature.
 - Automated PDF report generation for attendance records.

projects.title: Sikl App - Local Shoe Sales
projects.bodyText:
- Mobile application for local shoe sales and management.
 - Built with **Kotlin** and **Android Studio** for optimal performance.
 - User-friendly interface for seamless shopping experience.

projects.title: Kasirku - Point of Sales
projects.bodyText:
- An Point of Sales built using **CodeIgniter** framework.
 - Modern UI designed with **Bootstrap**.
 - Secure payment gateway integration with **Midtrans**.
 - Dynamic interactions powered by **jQuery** AJAX.

projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 - Fully customizable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support
